Flow.description: This flow intiates the opening and directs user to choose what action they wish to undertake
Flow.label: RAS Case Intro

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Send Verification Form
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0
fields.fieldText:
Verification Form Sent
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.
Tick box and click 'Next' to re-send Verification form
Note: form will only be sent to case contact
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Send Tech Form
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
School Opted Out
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opted Out
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Tech Form Sent
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.
Tick checkbox and click 'Next' to re-send Tech Form
Note: This will only be sent to the ICT Implementation Contact

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
SE Review
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
SE Complete
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_0_1
fields.fieldText:
Send Tech Form {!ICTContactERRMsg}
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out
(Click on link if school has withdrawn their request)
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_1
fields.fieldText:
Verification Form has been re-sent
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_1_1
fields.fieldText:
Please exit or close this window
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_1_1_2
fields.fieldText:
Please exit or close this window
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_0_1_2
fields.fieldText:
Tech Form has been re-sent
.

fields.name: RAS_Choices_MSG_1
fields.fieldText:
Send Verification Form {!ContactErrMSG}
.
Verfication Form Response Sheet
.
Tech Form Response Sheet
.
School Opt Out {!ContactErrMSG}
.

textTemplates.name: Chttr_OptOut
textTemplates.text: Confirmation has being received via communication that school has opted out. Case record is updated and email sent to case contact.

textTemplates.name: Chttr_TechFormSent
textTemplates.text: Form pre-fill link has been sent via email to case contact and following updated - case Status: 'Awaiting Customer', Form Status: 'Tech Form Sent', Account > Remote Access: 'Opt In'

textTemplates.name: ExitWin_MSG
textTemplates.text: To exit pop-up window, simply close window

textTemplates.name: RefreshCase
textTemplates.text: Please Note: to see the changes reflected on the case, you need to refresh the case window
